1.text: COOLDOWN: 1

2.text: OUTER LIMIT: 650

0.text: Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging abilities.
0.html: Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging abilities.

1.text: Each Star deals 12 − 120 (based on level) (+ 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on  Celestial Expansion's Rank) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy  minions that have less than  25 health, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.
1.html: Each Star deals 12 − 120 (based on level) (+ 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on Celestial Expansion's Rank) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy minions that have less than  25 health, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.

1.text: 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on  Celestial Expansion's Rank)

markedPassages: 12 − 120 (based on level)
(+ 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on Celestial Expansion's Rank)
5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (based on Celestial Expansion's Rank)
minions
25 health

1.text: SPEED: 850 − 600 (BASED ON DURATION)

2.text: CAST TIME: NONE

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol fires a star in the target direction that expands as long as it remains within the Outer Limit, granting him  20% bonus movement speed while active. If he moves faster than the star, the speed of the star will increase to stay within the Outer Limit.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol fires a star in the target direction that expands as long as it remains within the Outer Limit, granting him  20% bonus movement speed while active. If he moves faster than the star, the speed of the star will increase to stay within the Outer Limit.
markedPassages: 20% bonus movement speed

1.text: Starsurge can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the star is active, and does so automatically when the star travels beyond the Outer Limit.
1.html: Starsurge can be recast after 0.25 seconds while the star is active, and does so automatically when the star travels beyond the Outer Limit.

2.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the star, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).
2.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol detonates the star, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for a duration, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on time traveled).
markedPassages: stunning

0.text: Passive:  Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.
0.html: Passive: Center of the Universe's base damage is increased.
markedPassages: Center of the Universe's

1.text: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his  Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.
1.html: Active: Aurelion Sol expands his Stars to the Outer Limit for 3 seconds, rotating them at a high but decaying speed, and increasing their total damage by 40%.
markedPassages: Stars

2.text: Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting  Comet of Legend.
2.html: Celestial Expansion can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or casting Comet of Legend.
markedPassages: Comet of Legend

3.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract, granting him 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.
3.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol commands the stars to retract, granting him 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

4.text: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
4.html: Celestial Expansion's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control

2.text: CAST TIME: NONE

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his  Stars and takes flight,  dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his Stars and takes flight, dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.
markedPassages: Stars
dashing
unobstructed vision

1.text: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
1.html: Aurelion Sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
markedPassages: knocked down
immobilizing

2.text: Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy  champions or  turrets.
2.html: Comet of Legend can be recast after 1.5 seconds during flight, and automatically does so at maximum range or upon taking damage from enemy champions or turrets.
markedPassages: champions
turrets

3.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Comet of Legend early.

4.text: Taking damage while Comet of Legend is not active places it on a 4-second  static cooldown. Aurelion Sol will be  revealed while he is inside terrain and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.
4.html: Taking damage while Comet of Legend is not active places it on a 4-second  static cooldown. Aurelion Sol will be revealed while he is inside terrain and is in the line of sight of nearby enemies.
markedPassages: static cooldown
revealed

5.text: Starsurge can be used during the dash.
5.html: Starsurge can be used during the dash.
markedPassages: Starsurge

1.text: WIDTH:  240

2.text: SPEED: 4500

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting  sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path,  slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit,  stunning them for 0.125 seconds and  knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path, slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit, stunning them for 0.125 seconds and knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: sight
slowing
stunning
knocking them back

1.text: Aurelion Sol  channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be  interrupted by any  crowd control.
1.html: Aurelion Sol channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be interrupted by any crowd control.
markedPassages: channels
interrupted
crowd control

2.text: Celestial Expansion can be cast during Voice of Light.
2.html: Celestial Expansion can be cast during Voice of Light.
markedPassages: Celestial Expansion

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol pulls in his  Stars and takes flight,  dashing in the target direction. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and sets his movement speed to a static amount.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting  sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path,  slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit,  stunning them for 0.125 seconds and  knocking them back to it, though not through terrain.
